1: I love because my heartfelt prayers are heard.
2: I call throughout life, confident my voice is heard.
3: Life prevails with peace and enduring strength.
4: I call for help and receive deliverance
5: The divine is gracious, righteous, and merciful.
6: The humble receive protection and help
7: I rest, sustained by abundant goodness.
8: I live with joy and keep my steps steady.
9: I walk with integrity among the living
10: I believe, so I speak with confidence.
11: I pause and choose truthful words.
12: I give thanks for every blessing received
13: I accept deliverance and call on the divine
14: I keep my promises openly before everyone.
15: The faithful's passing is treasured and honored.
16: Faithful service brings freedom and lasting release
17: I give thanks and call on the divine
18: I fulfill my promises openly before the community.
19: We praise together at the heart of the community.
